Title: Requires the office of mental health, the office of addiction services and supports and the department of education to create a behavioral health website
Summary: Requires the office of mental health, office of addiction services and supports and the department of education to create a behavioral health website which shall provide information on various behavioral health issues such as depression, eating disorders, anxiety, schizophrenia, post-traumatic stress disorder and bipolar disorder.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring the office of mental health, the office of addiction services and supports and the department of education to create a behavioral health website
